bio.experienceSummary:
Hello! My name is Kayleigh, I have extensive experience working with preschool aged children as well as toddlers & infants. I love to teach and watch children grow! I love crafts, cooking, and the outdoors. I am passionate about quality childcare and have made it my career to help make a difference in children's lives! 

I recently moved to Brooklyn from Boston and I am looking for new families to work with nearby!

My experience includes: 
Teaching at Cole Harrington in Canton MA in infant, toddler, and preschool classrooms 
Nannying full time for a handful of different families, for ages newborn-7 years 

I am very flexible in my schedule and I'm willing to help out with just about anything! Remote learning, errands, school drop-off/pickup, cooking, cleaning, you name it!

I am fully vaccinated and willing to work with any Covid boundaries you have to make sure we have a totally safe and comfortable experience! 

Feel free to ask any questions you have if you need more information :)

Hi!! My name is Rocio, I'm in my mid 30's from Mexico. I've been working as a nanny in New York for the past 10 years with amazing families in Brooklyn, babysitting kids from different age groups (4 months old to 13 years old) Experiences were very different because each child had different character and was living different stages, but they surprised me with their ingenious way of looking at the world and learn, as well as I learned from them. I truly enjoyed taking care of them. I consider myself a very friendly and easy going person. If you are interested please let me know and we could schedule an appointment to meet in person and talk a little more. Looking forward for your reply. Thanks in advance!!

I have 8 years of experience in childcare, ranging from babysitting to tutoring and being a classroom assistant for a kindergarten class. During these years I have enjoyed my time babysitting kids from 4 months to 14 years old. I can help with Light Housekeeping and Grocery Shopping. Currently I am a graduate student at NYU studying global health with an emphasis on maternal and child health. I'm looking for part time work while I'm in school in an area that I enjoy, childcare! I love kids of all ages and I will create a fun and safe environment for your children to thrive in while under my care. I love being outside and doing crafts. I've also been a tutor in math and English, so I would be a great help with school. I have a lot of experience working with children, and I am confident that I can create a fun, engaging, and nurturing environment for your little ones!

description.originalText: There’s no one better to hire to watch your child. Maya continuously watched our son continuously from ages two months old to six month old. We always left feeling completely comfortable and reassured that he would be in great hands. She truly showed him so much love and would go the extra mile reading to him and washing his bottles and doing tummy time. If she didn’t move, we would be trying to get her to stay with us in a full-time nanny position

bio.experienceSummary:
Hi, I'm Idabelle!

I'm a 27-year-old nanny with over five years of experience caring for children of all ages. Most recently, I spent three wonderful years nannying for a family in Tribeca, where I cared for their two children from infancy through toddlerhood. I supported them through major milestones, from daily routines to family vacations, and developed a strong bond with the whole family.

I'm reliable, organized, and passionate about creating a warm, nurturing environment where kids can thrive. Whether it's planning engaging activities, helping with school routines, or ensuring everything runs smoothly, I truly love what I do. With the family I worked for recently relocating, I'm now excited to find a new family to support.

If you're looking for someone experienced, compassionate, and dependable, I'd love to connect!

Hi! I'm ramping up my own youth life coaching practice and absolutely love kids. My previous babysitting roles have confirmed that I'm patient, calm, friendly, and approachable. I also have over 10 years of experience caring for children of all ages from newborn to 12+.

Even if your kids are not quite old enough to play basketball, I played D1 so we'll get them playing on the little tykes hoop in no time. 

I believe in open communication with parents and regularly provide updates. I follow your lead on communication and parenting style. 

I'm comfortable caring for up to three children at a time and speak English. I'm also a non-smoker and comfortable with pets.

I'm confident that I can provide a safe, nurturing environment for your child and help them thrive. I look forward to meeting you and your family!

Hi! My name is Celeste. I have a degree in child psychology and have been a professional nanny for about 2. 5 years. I've worked with kids ages 5 months to 9 years old. I'm big on Montessori teachings and learning through play, as well as spending time outdoors. I have previously worked in the social services field as a family case manager, visitation monitor, and crisis helpline worker. I've recently relocated and am hoping to find a loving family to work for where my high energy and silliness will be appreciated!

Hi how are you? I have 4 years of experience looking after children from 2 months up to 12 years old I also have experience with twins and am currently studying English. Babysitting is a great job because I feel like I can learn from the kids too. As a nanny, I'm very patient and friendly and if you need anything I'm always willing to help. If you have any questions, please let me know.

description.displayText: Rayssa is amazing. We worked with her daily for about a month, and she is always early and never canceled. She is very energetic and kind, does a lot of physical activities with the child, and our child liked her better than us after a while. We feel like Rayssa is like family to us. We are grateful to have worked with her and even though we are moving, we hope to keep in touch.
description.originalText: Rayssa is amazing. We worked with her daily for about a month, and she is always early and never canceled. She is very energetic and kind, does a lot of physical activities with the child, and our child liked her better than us after a while. We feel like Rayssa is like family to us. We are grateful to have worked with her and even though we are moving, we hope to keep in touch.

bio.experienceSummary: Hope you're having a wonderful day! My name is Jona. Married with 3 kids. I have years of childcare experience - from newborn to teenage hood. I studied Nursing, graduated in 2012. Through my courses, I studied Pediatrics, child psychology and development. I am willing to do light housekeeping and anything child related. I am hardworking, diligent, patient, caring, nurturing and well-organized. With the kids, I love making arts and crafts, reading books, setting up age appropriate play dates, baking/cooking with them and for them, love being outdoors - having picnics, going to parks, playgrounds, the library and/or any outdoor activities. A plus is I also drive and upon request can bring the kids to the zoo, museums or even visits to the dentist or doctor. I also offer homework help, and help with any other school projects. I am here as your support, follow on your disciplining strategies, and help you along the way on your child's growth and development.

description.originalText: Jona was amazing. She is warm, confident and easy to communicate with. My 10 week old baby took to her right away and I felt at ease leaving her with Jona. I highly recommend her!

bio.experienceSummary:
Hi Dear Family 
I'm Esra, a dedicated and positive nanny with nearly 5 years of childcare experience.
My experience includes working as an Au Pair for two young girls (ages 7 and 3) and as a teaching assistant in a preschool, where I cared for children from 1 month to 12 years old. I handle all aspects of childcare, including feeding, diaper changes, nap time, light housekeeping, and planning fun, educational activities. I always bring a positive attitude and energy to my work, ensuring that both children and families feel supported and happy.
My priority is to always ensure a safe and nurturing environment for children while following parents' routines and guidelines. I am CPR and First Aid certified, a non-smoker, and a confident driver. I have a own car. In addition, I am comfortable around pets and happy to assist with caring for them as well.
I'm located in Palisades Park, NJ, and would love to discuss how I can support your family. Please feel free to reach out!
Thank you, 
Esra

description.originalText:
Esra helped babysit our toddler and she was amazing. She played with our daughter the entire time, she was so sweet and reorganized the playroom toys in a Montessori way and she even offered to stay late to help put the toddler and baby to sleep. Oyr daughter loved her. 
We definitely will hire Esra again when we get a chance to have a night out if she's available.

bio.experienceSummary:
Hello, thank you for checking out my profile! I am a COVID-conscious childcare provider. Childcare is my passion, I am one of the oldest of 150 cousins and 10 siblings! I have over 8 years of babysitting, summer camp, nannying, and classroom experience with children of all ages, with a special focus on 0-5. I would describe my style of childcare as aligned with gentle parenting, I try to foster autonomy, self-expression, and emotional intelligence while still being gentle yet firm with boundaries and safety. I am vaccinated, mask with high filtration respirators indoors and in outdoor crowded spaces, test regularly, and only share air with people who do the same. I am happy to discuss COVID precautions to protect you and your family. References available.

I am available for one-time or recurring babysitting, pet sitting, and tutoring jobs in NYC. I pride myself on my open communication and I look forward to making your experience as smooth and stress-free as possible.

description.displayText: We hired Jae to watch our two kids (4 & 2yo) on a Saturday night. She was on time, professional and communicative. It was our first time using someone that was not our regular nanny as a babysitter and she was amazing. She put our minds at ease right away and was great with the kids.  They warmed up to her right away. She kept us updated throughout the night on how the kids were doing, which was greatly appreciated. She got the kids to bed on time and the kids enjoyed having her as their babysitter. We will definitely use her again in the future.
